This is a follow up to that review; in a nutshell: Rosadyn keeps its 5-star rating!I was diagnosed with rosacea in my late 30's -- about 15 years ago. It came in a very appealing packaging and was not damaged. Shipping was really fast. This product if worth every penny. A face mask should never be allowed to fully dry on your skin. The main benefit of a mud mask is in the damp phase where the nutrients are absorbed by the skin. During phase 2, the mask will begin to dry & stimulate blood flow, causing skin to contract. Where most masks go wrong is by drying too quickly, thus drawing out too much moisture. This drying sensation is often mistaken for a "tightening and lifting effect" but really leaves skin dehydrated, irritated and itchy. Best face wash ever, extremely gentle, have used for years. I have sensitive oily acne prone skin. I use this product with a washcloth in the morning and with the Clarisonic Mia at night (first I remove excess oil with a tissue).For anyone interested in my full routine:Wake up: Thayer's Cucumber TonerMorning face routine:1) Exuviance Gentle Cleansing Creme (use with a washcloth to get a "cleaner feel")2) Paula's Choice Resist Ultra-Light Super Antioxidant Concentrate Serum3) Paula's Choice Skin Balancing Invisible Finish Moisture Gel4) Paula's Choice Calm Redness Relief Moisturizer Normal to Oily (I only apply this to my neck but it's also okay for the face)5) Exuviance Sheer Daily Protector SPF 50 (this has a slight tint to it so I don't use foundation and I just follow this with Paula's Choice powder)6) Cetaphil Daily Facial Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 50 (I only use this on my neck). This product is sold on Amazon as well as in drugstores and big box stores.Evening Routine:1) Wipe face with a tissue to remove excess oil and powder2) Paula's Choice Gentle Touch Makeup Remover (I only use this to remove eye makeup but it can be used on the whole face-I've just never tried it)3) Exuviance Gentle Cleasing Creme with Clarisonic Mia4) Retin-A Micro Pump .04%5) Exuviance Night Renewal Hydragel (I only use this on my face, for some reason this product gives me a rash on my neck but it works very well on my face...I have ultra sensitive crazy skin!)6) Paula's Choice Redness Relief Moisturizer Normal to Oily (again, I only use this on my neck but I used to use it on my face at night)When going to the pool or beach I use Elta MD UV Sport SPF 50 on my face.  It doesn't sting my eyes like a lot of sunscreens do and it doesn't cause my acne to flare up.I'm 37 years old and my skin was under control with Proactiv from age 22 until I had my son at 32. The key to beginning Retin-A is to apply 1 pump once every 3rd night for 2 weeks, then every other night for 2 weeks, then every night. If your face gets red or upset, return to every other night.You can contact Paula's Choice and Exuviance for inexpensive samples. NeoStrata: EXUVIANCE® Gentle Cleansing Creme ReviewWhen it comes to washes, scrubs and cleaners, the last thing that comes to mind in using a creme. It brings back memories of the old Pond’s tub my Mother used to remove her make-up, which left an oily residue after using it. You knew don’t touch Mom after she removes her make-up! When I received the Cleansing Creme from Exuviance, I must admit that was the first thought that came to mind. I also have to be frank that as much as enjoy “gentle” to my skin products, I stay away from them because they are sometimes too gentle yielding them ineffective. Okay, I have not opened the box and here I am bringing up childhood nightmares, but I always give products a chance and especially those from the NeoStrata family.The Gentle Cleansing Creme from Exuviance, is advertised as a soap-free formula. It allows the user to gently remove everything from make-up, build-up, to the everyday impurities our face may collect during the day. At the same time it serves not only as a cleanser but a moisturizer. If you thought that was already impressive, the Gentle Cleansing Creme from Exuviance also contains anti-aging ingredients like Polyhydroxy Acid (PHA), and other botanical ingredients that help sooth and condition your skin. The product is gentle enough for sensitive skin suffers but can be used by people with combination skin too. It’s a friendly cleanser!Ingredients (as listed on the website): Water (Aqua), Isododecane, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/ Dicaprate, Glycerin, Ethylhexyl Isononanoate, Butylene Glycol, Glyceryl Stearate SE, PEG-100 Stearate, Triundecanoin, Cetyl Alcohol, Octyldodecanol, Stearyl Alcohol, Gluconolactone, Cetearyl Glucoside, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Althaea Officinalis Root Extract, Chamomile Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Propylene Glycol, Laureth-7, Polyacrylamide, Disodium EDTA, Chlorphenesin, Methylparaben, Parfum (Fragrance), Benzyl Benzoate.Verdict:Okay, I clear my head and start using the cleanser creme twice a day as recommended. The first day the product arrived, I washed my face in middle of the day to get an idea how it worked and how it would make my skin feel. You simply moisten your face and hands, pump out a small dollop, and begin to massage your face and neck. Always with an upward circular motion. The Exuviance Gentle Cleansing Creme gives you the option in using a facial tissue for removal, or you may simply just rinse your face off with warm water. The first difference I noticed and this is just after my first use, is a silky feeling. My face was super smooth and get this, not greasy. Even my hands were left feeling soft! I opted for the rinsing with warm water method for removal and mostly because it is what I am most comfortable with but I like the idea of being able to use a tissue if needed. This means no excuses when it comes to make-up removal no matter how late I get home! The next week I began to use the wash when I had make-up and for those days I did not wear any too. If you use a waterproof eyeliner or mascara, I did find I was left with raccoon-ish eyes if I just depended on the cleansing creme, but this also goes for when I just used a common cleanser/scrub before. I always have to address waterproof anything by using a facial wet wipe to insure full removal. Other than this, the cleansing creme is gentle on the skin but it still does it’s job very well at cleaning your face! I want a clean face and washing my face is almost therapeutic for me and this is why I have a unusual collection of face washes. Being able to enjoy make-up means I have to take care of my skin and the first thing I learned about skincare, is how you begin makes a difference. A clean slate is what you want but not a depleted one. Meaning you don’t want to to do what I did in my teen years and treat my skin like if you were stripping wall paper of a wall. I use to think in my teens the cleaner, the better. No oils, no natural sheen just take it all off because I feared blemishes. I did not suffer from them in my teen years, but this is probably why when I hit 25, my face had had it with me and I began to experience break-outs. With Exuviance’s’ Gentle Cleansing Creme, you avoid the over stripping but you do actually end up with a clean surface and super soft skin. As I used the cleansing creme, by week 2, my face was soft 24/7. I did not have to depend on serums for a natural glow and the texture of my skin improved naturally, I was left with a smoother looking surface that allowed my pores and imperfections to appear…..well, smoothed out. I can’t tell you (I know I’m harping on it) how soft my skin feels and appears now. I love it. I don’t have a kid but I assume this is why people state soft as a baby’s bum! I get it now and no breakouts or anything. Right now, the weather in Southern California is mixed. Gloomy days, windy days, to sunny days and my skin is in transition again like these undefined seasons. The calendar says Spring and my nose and allergies agree, but my skin thinks it’s Fall with the way the days change so drastically from one day to another. With Exuviance’s Gentle Cleansing Creme, my skin is moisturized the minute the cleanser finishes washing off the grime of the day and the best part, it comes in a tube versus the jar that I fear! Try it and see for yourself how much the Gentle Cleansing Creme from Exuviance will change your mind and how you can do more for your skin by just using this face wash.I received the above product(s) free of charge from NeoStrata/Exuviance. I am not obligated to provide a positive or favorable review, just my honest opinion. My review is based on my experience with the product and/or brand, which may differ from yours. Winter in the north woods of Wisconsin can get pretty dry and rough on the skin so it is important to have a quality product that won't dry out the skin further. I love Exuviance products, I have reviewed several different ones. The Exuviance Gentle Cleansing Creme is formulated to be effective in removing makeup and other impurities without messing with natural moisture in the skin. This creme does not lather up, I was expecting it to because I am used to facial cleansers to foam up. No problem, though, I have been using it for some time now, about a month, and I use it the recommended 2x day. You do not need a lot, I use about 1/4th of a teaspoon each time. It goes on nice and rinses off really well, taking the makeup with. It has a light pleasant smell and the tube is 7.2 ounces so it will last for awhile, which I like. I have experienced no breakouts, just nice smooth skin after I have used it. You can cleanse with it and then use a facial cream of some type or just cleanse, rinse and go. As with other Exuviance products I have tried, I am extremely satisfied!I received this product for my review that is honest and unbiased. I have rosacea and searched forever to find a cleanser that would keep my face clean and clear of breakouts but also be gentle enough not to irritate my sensitive skin. I've been using it for about two years and have no plans to change it. My skin has never looked better. Get it; you won't regret it. I got to try this as a sample and I absolutely love it and I want to get a bottle of this, this is by far the best cleanser for my face and I've tried other brands and haha it's not as amazing as this stuff. Admittedly, when I first used it, I didn't like it either.  But after a few uses, it became an acquired taste and now I look forward to its smell on my face.I think I have an oilier face.  Most products are too strong for my face -- they leave my face feeling "tight" (dry, dehydrated?).  This is probably not good.  Urth Face Wash is one of the few I've found that cleans my face well, without leaving it feeling dry.The texture and viscosity are two excellent features of this Wash. I find it frustrating when face washes aren't viscuous enough so I have to get a second squeeze of wash from the bottle -- this is *not* a problem with Urth Face Wash. I recently bought this Magic Korean Body Scrub and used it and my skin felt so soft after the first use! I found that the best way to use it is to steam your skin under hot water first to sort of "loosen" the skin, then apply the soap everywhere and leave it on without washing off for the time shown on the soap (like 10-15 minutes). Then take an italy towel, and scrub. Literal chunks of dead skin come off, huge amounts of grey old flakes that I've never had occur with any other type of soap. This is really incredible for keratosis pilaris, and helped prevent most of the body breakouts I typically get from lifeguarding (sweat + sunscreen for long hours is not a good combination) and I noticed an improvement in skin smoothness and texture. It hasn't done that much for scars, but using this soap post chemical peel helped me get rid of the peeling skin easier. (Don't do that unless the skin's already coming off by itself  after the peel though , or you'll get skin darkening and scarring. I'm just impatient lol.) This soap also worked wonders on ingrown hairs that I had from shaving, and got rid of my godawful "strawberry legs". It just looks smooth and lovely. The fragrance is herbal, like ginseng. While bathing, the bathroom will smell like the soap, but I haven't found the scent to linger post shower. Its similar to other hanbang type scents, which I personally like.This soap + an italy towel + a hot shower = your new wifey, don't hesitate.
